definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: As a piece of a pomegranate are thy temples within thy locks.
sentences.chinese: 你的兩太陽在帕子內，如同一塊石榴。

sentences.english: 19 the earrings and bracelets and veils
Hong veil tired of rubbing the blue points.
We eyed it, the dropped kerchief of time.
sentences.chinese: 我們注視着它，這遺落的時光的帕子。

sentences.english: And she arose， and went away， and laid by her vail from her， and put on the garments of her widowhood.
sentences.chinese: 他瑪起來走了，除去帕子，仍舊穿上作寡婦的衣裳。

sentences.english: And till Moses had done speaking with them， he put a vail on his face.
sentences.chinese: 摩西與他們說完了話就用帕子蒙上臉。

sentences.english: Like pomegranate fruit are the sides of your head under your veil.
sentences.chinese: 你的兩太陽在帕子內，如同一塊石榴。

sentences.english: But whenever their heart turns to the Lord, the veil is taken away.
sentences.chinese: 但他們的心幾時轉向主，帕子就幾時除去了。

definition: the front piece(s) of a Chinese jacket/lapel
to wash one's hands/(fig.) to go to the toilet
